alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.lowBatteryDesc: The battery charge has dropped below the safe threshold. Please take necessary action.
alerts.overloadDesc: The system is experiencing a power overload. Check connections and reduce load.
alerts.maintenanceDesc: Scheduled maintenance is pending. Ensure solar panels and batteries are inspected.
alerts.systemHealthyDesc: All systems are functioning properly with no detected issues.
alerts.batteryFullDesc: The battery has reached full capacity and is ready for use.
